attributes.action: make a public statement to explain why not one single Government Minister nor Member of Parliament has been laid off while there are hundreds of thousands of taxpaying employees being laid off every week.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government costs taxpayers an absolute fortune.  Why, then, at a time when taxpayer contributions are being reduced  because of layoffs (caused by recession) across all spectrums of employment, there are no members of parliament being laid of - in pro rata rates - thereby reducing the cost of government.  When the numbers of people 'on the dole' and not contributing are increasing it is not morally supportable that our government should continue to cost the remaining (and getting fewer) taxpayers as much as when there is 'full' employment in the country.
